text: On 18 April 2014, an avalanche on Mount Everest killed 16 people and injured 9 others. The avalanche was caused by a serac which fell from the slopes of Everest above the icefall. A serac is a large block of ice. == References == Category:2014 disasters in Asia Category:2010s in Nepal Category:April 2014 events Category:Disasters in Nepal
title: 2014 Mount Everest avalanche
